text: Students of this school have been seen doing racist gestures towards Asian students during their annual Ski Trip to Switzerland, the gesture was done by a Grade 6 student ! Makes me wonder how the school educates their students and if they really deserves the trust given by parents and guardians.

So surprised of too many negative comments, as a new immigrant family we more care how the school let bully happen, so grateful that my kids weren’t trapped in the end except pity on money loss for the meaningless enrollment application. Thanks to the comments I even changed my plan to buy condo nearby, 5 stars is for true voices can be heard.

Omg! The staff of the school sucks and feels so entitled! It's all over the internet! Anyhow press emergency button of the smrt train , never use brain to let the whole group of 15-20 alright at various exits , instead taking own sweet time to alight at a single door, 😱, when the smrt door closed, have the audacity to press emergency button thinking that it's customer service! So what if the child's father is separated from the child, the staff is incompetent to take care of the child, bring the remaining people to alight at the next stop to return back to the lakeside station. This action reflects on the school badly, school might even receive a fine from SMRT for wrongly using their emergency button causing inconvenience to public. Cannot imagine how the staff can teach the children in this schoo when their staff cannot even think straight . Choose schools wisely

I attended this school. It was full of spoiled students with a white supremacist mindset, and I experienced discrimination as an Asian. In a multicultural country like Singapore, there is no value in attending a school where such people gather. Also underaged drinking and smoking were the norm.

Tanglin Trust School is the most educational place for International schools on different countries 👍👍

I've been there doing some arcylic floral coasters booth with my working friend last time! But right now, this is my 2nd time at there doing my booth again 🎉🎊🥳🥳🎊🎉 It was fun 🥳🎊🎉🎊🥳
